item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (495 points | 344 comments)
2. Were RNNs all we needed? (191 points | 81 comments)
3. You Can't Opt-Out of A.I. Online (15 points | 13 comments)
4. The Heart of Unix (2018) (40 points | 8 comments)
5. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (181 points | 94 comments)
6. Serving 70B-scale LLMs efficiently on low-resource edge devices [pdf] (182 points | 49 comments)
7. Image Editing with Gaussian Splatting (203 points | 53 comments)
8. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
9. What Kind of Writer Is ChatGPT? (53 points | 36 comments)
10. HTTrack Website Copier (30 points | 5 comments)
11. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (23 points | 9 comments)
12. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (64 points | 13 comments)
13. Tengine: Open-source web server, originated by Taobao, based on Nginx (8 points | 2 comments)
14. Solving methane mysteries with satellite imagery (102 points | 19 comments)
15. Biggest solar flare since 2017 erupts from sun and Earth is in the firing line (35 points | 1 comment)
16. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (654 points | 207 comments)
17. Tracking (C++) Shared Pointer Leaks (14 points | 2 comments)
18. US Dept of Energy announces $1.5B in electric grid improvements (57 points | 21 comments)
19. Show HN: I made a super-simple image CDN (9 points | 2 comments)
20. I Solve Problems (talk at EuroBSDCon 2024) (38 points | 4 comments)
21. Britain's last coal-fired power plant shuts down (16 points | 4 comments)
22. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (98 points | 98 comments)
23. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (149 points | 102 comments)
24. Google says it won't follow Amazon's lead with a return-to-office mandate (147 points | 131 comments)
25. Discussing the Neptunian desert, savanna, and ridge (16 points | 3 comments)
26. Why Gumroad Didn't Choose Htmx (211 points | 109 comments)
27. Flawless is now in public beta (12 points | 3 comments)
28. Identification of officer from Sir John franklin's Northwest Passage expedition (14 points | 3 comments)
29. Response to WP Engine’s Meritless Lawsuit (43 points | 57 comments)
30. Starlink offering free internet access for 30 days for Hurricane Helene victims (202 points | 165 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
